meanings.definition: The quality of providing knowledge or information.
meanings.sent1: Her instructiveness in the classroom helped students understand complex topics easily.
meanings.sent2: The instructiveness of the book made it a valuable resource for learning.
meanings.sent3: The instructiveness of the cooking show made even the most clueless chef feel confident.
meanings.sent4: His instructiveness was like a beacon of light in the sea of confusion.
meanings.sent5: The instructiveness of the map made navigating the city a breeze.

meanings.definition: The act of teaching or guiding someone.
meanings.sent1: The instructiveness of the tutor was evident in the student's improved grades.
meanings.sent2: Effective instructiveness is essential for a successful learning environment.
meanings.sent3: The instructiveness of the dance instructor turned even the clumsiest student into a performer.
meanings.sent4: Her instructiveness was a steady hand guiding them through the stormy seas of knowledge.
meanings.sent5: The instructiveness of the coach motivated the team to achieve victory.
